item.title: Nvidia’s $340 Billion Rout Drags Stock Below Key Technical Level

review.headline_rewrite: Nvidia’s $340 Billion Rout Drags Stock Below Key Technical Level
bullets: Last week, Nvidia gave a tepid revenue forecast that underlined investor concerns about the pace of spending on AI infrastructure.

item.title: Yes Bank share price in focus after CCI approves SMBC’s proposal to acquire up to 24.99% stake
